testcase.name: Scenario 1 - Clear cart and abandon shopping
testcase.system-out: Given Store website has loaded..............................................passed And The item Bacardi Breezer - Tropical is successfully added to the cart...passed When The clear button is clicked............................................passed Then The cart is clear......................................................passed

testcase.name: Scenario 2 - Adjust quantities and checkout
testcase.system-out: Given Store website has loaded..............................................passed And The item Bacardi Breezer - Tropical is added to the cart................passed And A second item Wine - Gato Negro Cabernet is added to the cart...........passed And The Cart link is clicked................................................passed And Cart page has loaded....................................................passed When The quantity of the first item is increased............................passed And The quantity of the first item is increased.............................passed And The total of items match................................................passed And The total payment amount matches........................................passed And The first item has a reduce button in cart..............................passed And The second item has a delete button in cart.............................passed And The reduce button is clicked for the first item.........................passed And The total of items match................................................passed And The total payment amount matches........................................passed And The delete button is clicked for the second item........................passed And The total of items match................................................passed And The total payment amount matches........................................passed And The checkout button is clicked..........................................passed Then The Checkout successfully message is displayed.........................passed And The cart is clear.......................................................passed
